text.cover:
CATALO GUE
OF A LARGE
COLLECTION
O F
Antient and Modem Coins
and Medals,
I N
GOLD, SILVER, and COPPER,
CONSISTING OS'
Phoenician* Etrufcan, Greek, Roman, Saxon, Englifh, Papal,
Many of them exceeding rare and in fine Prefervation,
WHICH WILL BE
SOLD by AUCTION, By Mr. GERARD,
At his Houfein Litchfield-Street,
St. Anne's, Soho,
On Tuesday, the 24th, Wednesday, the 25th, and Thursday', the 26th,
of February, 1778.
To be viewed onSATRUDAY, the 21 ft, Monday, the 23d, and each Day till the! ime of Sale, which will
begin at Half an Hour afterEleven o'Ciocic precifely.
CATALOGUES to be had, gratis, at Mr. GERARDO aforefaid.
